original_text: And it came to pass in the evening, that he took Leah his daughter, and brought her to him; and he went in unto her.
korean_text: 저녁에 그의 딸 레아를 야곱에게로 데려가매 야곱이 그에게로 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in the evening
that he took Leah his daughter
and he went in unto her
